timeline.message:
Add journal abbreviation for AMSES

Full name: Advanced Modeling and Simulation in Engineering Sciences
Url: https://amses-journal.springeropen.com/

Add journal abbreviation for "Appl. Math."

Full name: Applications of Mathematics
Url: https://www.springer.com/journal/10492

Add another journal

Full name: Integrating Materials and Manufacturing Innovation
Url: https://www.springer.com/journal/40192/

Add journal abbreviation for NLAA

Full name: Numerical Linear Algebra with Applications
Url: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/10991506

Add journal abbreviation of another SIAM journal

Full name: SIAM Journal on Scientific and Statistical Computing
Url: https://epubs.siam.org/loi/sijcd4

Add journal abbrev for "Engineering Computations"

Full name: Engineering Computations
Url: https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0264-4401

Add abbrev for "Journal of Computational Science"

Full name: Journal of Computational Science
Url: https://www.journals.elsevier.com/journal-of-computational-science

Add abbrev for "Computational Materials Science"

Full name: Computational Materials Science
Url: https://www.journals.elsevier.com/computational-materials-science
Insert missing space in journal abbreviation

timeline.bodyText: and or in are left out in the ISO specs, so I would expect Adv. Model. Simul. Eng. Sci.
timeline.author: jlaehne

replies.bodyText: @jlaehne You're right. I will fix this.
replies.author: mayrmt
